description: Section 73 application to remove condition 4 of planning permission reference P091006 dated 20 August 2009 granted for the installation of a cycle hire docking station to the carriageway.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  Prior to the commencement of works full details, including detailed drawings at a scale of 1:10 shall be submitted for the following parts of the proposal;
i) Design and Layout of the Docking Points
ii) Lock and Release Mechanism of Docking Points.
No works shall take place until the Councils written approval is received.  Works must be carried out according to these details approved.  No change shall take place from this arrangement without the prior written consent of the local planning authority.

The details submitted to the Local Planning Authority on 04/03/10 pursuant to condition 2 of planning permission reference P091006 [LBI ref: P091006(C2)] and approved by the Local Planning Authority on 13/05/10 shall be deemed to be approved for the purposes of this condition.

REASON:  To make sure that the appearance of the docking station is suitable and does not harm the character of the surrounding area; in the interests of public safety; to allow ease of access and use by all users.  In accordance with policies D1, D4, T15 and T45 of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002.
